ref: 2269 *upastarati, úpastr̥ṇāti ʻ spreads over, scatters under ʼ RV., upāstarati VarBr̥S. 2. upastáraṇa -- n. ʻ cover ʼ RV., ʻ undermattress ʼ ĀśvGr̥. 3. *upastr̥ta -- ʻ spread over ʼ. [√str̥]
K. watharun ʻ to spread out (carpet, mat, &c.), throw (person on ground) ʼ;
Si. vätirenavā (from tr. *vatur -- ) ʻ to lie prone, sprawl, overflow ʼ (ES 85 < vistārayati).
